channel.title: Go Humble! RSS GAMES
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle games bundles!

item.title: Better with 4 Friends! Co-Op Bundle
item.content:encoded: Grab your besties for a co-op game night with the all-new Better With 4 Friends Bundle! Play a variety of hilarious and wacky indie games designed to get the whole squad laughing. Lay track before the train crashes in Unrailed!, turn moving day into pure chaos in Moving Out, and battle blazes together in Embr—plus so much more. Pay what you want for this laugh-packed collection and help support the Michael J. Fox Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: Pixel and Cartoon Enthusiasts Bundle
item.content:encoded: Dive headfirst into the Pixel and Cartoon Enthusiasts GOG Bundle and explore a vibrant library of standout indie titles! Lead an underground resistance in Nazi Germany in Through the Darkest of Times, sneak your way through a spaghetti-western adventure in El Hijo, and explore a forgotten galaxy of strange planets in Residual—plus much more. Pay what you want for the very best in pixel-perfect and cartoony games—and help support Children's Miracle Network Hospitals with your purchase!

item.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Classics Collection
item.content:encoded: Love retro TTRPGs? Rediscover legendary adventures with the all-new D&D Classics Bundle from SNEG GAMES! This collection is packed with faithfully recreated campaigns for modern fans, featuring titles like Forgotten Realms: The Archives – Collection I & II, Dungeons & Dragons: Dark Sun Series, Spelljammer: Pirates of Realmspace, and more. Pay what you want to journey through timeless D&D adventures and help support Covenant House with your purchase!

item.title: Sniper Elite: Classics Collection
item.content:encoded:
Feel the exhilaration of lining up the perfect shot with the Sniper Elite: Classics Collection. Choose from dozens of rifles, maps, and targets across 5 complete Sniper Elite titles—including the Sniper Elite 5 and Sniper Elite 4 Deluxe. Relive sweet shots with the awesome Kill Cam and immerse yourself in the strategic gameplay. Pay what you want for hours of in-depth gunplay from the ultimate shooting simulation experience, and help support The Trevor Project with your purchase.

The Trevor Project was not involved in the selection of the content in this promotion and the views, opinions, and ideas expressed in the games are not endorsed by, and do not reflect or represent the views and opinions of The Trevor Project.

item.title: Untold Tales' Indie Roulette Bundle
item.content:encoded: Pay what you want to spin the wheel and play Indie Roulette with our latest bundle! Get 10 unique titles—each completely different and fresh. Want to play a cozy game? We got Everdream Valley. Prefer a brutal top-down shooter? You're in for a treat with The Hong Kong Massacre. In the mood to relax with a round of golf? Look no further than Golf Club Nostalgia. We have every corner of the gaming spectrum covered! Let the games begin and help support Children's Miracle Network Hospitals with your purchase!
